item.title: Shoes Tutorial Note, Garelly 2-1: Simple Multi Custom Edit Lines
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
- select an input area by mouse click
- String key and backspace key are available
- if you press enter-key, Shoes alert window will be pop-up
- cursor does not blink but appear at the end of input

# garelly2-1.png

Garelly 2-1 was created for Dave Lilley's question in the Shoes course 5th batch at RubyLearning.

Thanks,
ashbb
